extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181; BISC100; BISC101) or permission of the Dept.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM201; DRAM202; DRAM220.

basic.description: A study of applied dramatic literature, including structure, genre, and staging techniques. Students will analyze several plays from various points of view, embracing both theatrical and literary concerns.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Introduction to Dramaturgy
